mapper.sql: select id, plant, pn, uid, line, wo, po, pallet_no, batch_qty, uid_no, sap101, production_date, batch, remark, qa_sign, qa_result, customer_result from fg_checklist
mapper.select: select * from xTend_MaterialTransactions WHERE UID = #{uid} AND TransactionType = '313'
mapper.insert: if not exists(select * from [HTMES_MES_Main].[dbo].[xTend_MaterialTransactions] WHERE [UID] = #{checkList.uid} AND [TransactionType] = '315') begin INSERT INTO [HTMES_MES_Main].[dbo].[xTend_MaterialTransactions] ([TransactionHistoryId], [Batch], [PartNumber], [UID], [Quantity], [FromStock], [ToStock], [TransactionUser], [TransactionTime], [RecordStatus], [TransactionType], [TransactionReason], [RFCTemplateID], [Plant], [PO_NUMBER], [RefDocNo], [DocHeader], [ERPFromStock], [ERPToStock]) VALUES (NEWID(), #{checkList.batch}, #{checkList.pn}, #{checkList.uid}, #{checkList.uid_no}, #{FromStock}, #{ToStock}, #{username}, GETDATE(), 999, '315', '99', 'Z_AEGIS_GOODSMVT_TRANSFER', #{checkList.plant}, #{checkList.wo}, #{RefDocNo}, #{DocHeader}, #{FromStock}, #{ToStock}) end
mapper.select: select ISNULL(SUM(quantity), 0) FROM [HTMES_MES_Main].[dbo].[xTend_MaterialTransactions] where PartNumber = #{pn} and Plant = #{plant} and batch = #{batch} and TransactionType = #{transactiontype} and RecordStatus = 999
